India needs to engage with Bangladesh mu.title: Bangladesh’s student protests: A test for Sheikh Hasina’s leadership

As Bangladesh limps back to normalcy, with Internet and mobile phone services restored, people are still asking how and why the agitating students, who were for weeks protesting peacefully, suddenly turned violent and hostile. A striking feature of the protests was the way the word “razakar” became a rallying cry of the protests as furious students embraced the reviled word that was used to malign them.

Maharashtra Assembly Election 2024: A St.title: This mandate is against the unilateral changes initiated by New Delhi after 2019: Mirwaiz Umar Farooq

The Mirwaiz discusses the recent elections in Kashmir, calling them a “consolidated ballot” against the changes made by New Delhi since 2019. He says people voted to show they reject these changes, not because they’re happy with the “Naya Kashmir” idea. He talks about how the BJP government’s actions have affected Kashmir. The Mirwaiz believes that removing Article 370 hasn’t solved any problems. Instead, he thinks it has made the Kashmir issue more international, with China now involved because of Ladakh.

Maharashtra Assembly Election 2024: A St.title: Kashmir’s split verdict: Democracy or division?
Maharashtra Assembly Election 2024: A St.description: Jammu and Kashmir’s first Assembly election in a decade yields a split verdict, with the NC-Congress-CPI(M) alliance winning a majority of 49 seats out of 90. The election results reveal a stark regional divide: the NC alliance dominates the Kashmir Valley with 41 out of 47 seats, while the BJP sweeps Jammu with 29 out of 43 seats. The PDP faces a significant setback, dropping from 29 seats in 2014 to just 3 seats in 2024, signaling a major shift in the Valley’s political landscape.

Hong Kong activists get 10 years prison.title: 45 Hong Kong activists get 4-10 years in jail
Hong Kong activists get 10 years prison.description: Dozens of prominent activists were sentenced to up to 10 years in prison on Tuesday in Hong Kong’s biggest national security case under a sweeping law imposed by Beijing that crushed a once-thriving pro-democracy movement.

Trump’s ‘Second Coming’ is no miracle.title: Trump’s ‘Second Coming’ is no miracle
Trump’s ‘Second Coming’ is no miracle.description: Donald Trump has clinched a decisive victory over Kamala Harris in the 2024 presidential race, securing both the Electoral College and the popular vote while helping Republicans capture the Senate. Trump’s success in traditionally Democratic areas, including New York City boroughs, suggests a fundamental shift in American politics rather than mere polarisation.

Trump’s ‘Second Coming’ is no miracle.title: Project 2025: The ‘secret’ agenda of Trump 2.0
Trump’s ‘Second Coming’ is no miracle.description: “Project 2025”, prepared by conservative think tank Heritage Foundation, provides a peek into what the second Trump administration might look like, and some of the things in it are very controversial.  With the choice of J.D. Vance as his vice-presidential nominee, Trump has tried to further cement his populist image as the saviour of the white working classes.

Trump vs Harris: America’s unprecedented.description: Biden’s withdrawal, Trump’s survival, and Harris’s rise reshape US presidential election. First convicted former president faces first potential female president. Key events, polling insights, and battleground state analysis

Trump vs Harris: America’s unprecedented.title: The streets stay silent as America splits between Trump and Harris
Trump vs Harris: America’s unprecedented.description: The 2024 US presidential election between Trump and Harris shows remarkably few public signs of campaign activity compared to democracies like India and Denmark, with politics confined to controlled private venues rather than streets.
